entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/c0/lld7zvgs4x98fk39ht79nhj00000gn/T/tmppve85eit/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:MinorityInterest with a value of -1,325,781 is represented as a child of us-gaap:StockholdersEquity with a value of -13,491,480 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000002 - Statement - Balance Sheets. The element us-gaap:MinorityInterest however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:StockholdersEquity in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:MinorityInterest as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:StockholdersEquity in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:StockholdersEquity and the child element us-gaap:MinorityInterest. The element MinorityInterest should be defined as a child of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest and not a child of StockholdersEquity which excludes non controlling interests.
The properties of this us-gaap:MinorityInterest fact are:
Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 14.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1530746/000172186820000213/kays-20191231.xml 805
